SEARCH
Package com.landawn.abacus.util

Class JSONUtil

java.lang.Object
com.landawn.abacus.util.JSONUtil
public final class JSONUtil extends Object
The JSONUtil class provides utility methods for handling JSON data. It includes methods for wrapping and unwrapping JSON objects and arrays, converting between JSON and Java data types, and handling exceptions related to JSON processing.

  • Method Details

    • wrap

      public static org.json.JSONObject wrap(Map<String,?> map)
      Wraps the provided map into a JSONObject.
      Parameters:
      map - The map to be wrapped into a JSONObject.
      Returns:
      A new JSONObject that represents the provided map.

    • wrap

      public static org.json.JSONObject wrap(Object bean)
      Wraps the provided bean into a JSONObject.
      Parameters:
      bean - The bean to be wrapped into a JSONObject. This can be a Map or any other object that can be converted into a Map.
      Returns:
      A new JSONObject that represents the provided bean.

    • wrap

      public static org.json.JSONArray wrap(boolean[] array) throws org.json.JSONException
      Wraps the provided boolean array into a JSONArray.
      Parameters:
      array - The boolean array to be wrapped into a JSONArray.
      Returns:
      A new JSONArray that represents the provided boolean array.
      Throws:
      org.json.JSONException - if there is an error during the wrapping process.

    • unwrap

      public static Map<String,Object> unwrap(org.json.JSONObject jsonObject) throws org.json.JSONException
      Unwraps the provided JSONObject into a Map.
      Parameters:
      jsonObject - The JSONObject to be unwrapped into a Map.
      Returns:
      A new Map that represents the provided JSONObject.
      Throws:
      org.json.JSONException - if there is an error during the unwrapping process.

    • unwrap

      public static <T> T unwrap(org.json.JSONObject jsonObject, Class<? extends T> targetType) throws org.json.JSONException
      Unwraps the provided JSONObject into an instance of the specified target type.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the object to return.
      Parameters:
      jsonObject - The JSONObject to be unwrapped into an instance of the target type.
      targetType - The class of the object to return.
      Returns:
      An instance of the specified target type that represents the provided JSONObject.
      Throws:
      org.json.JSONException - if there is an error during the unwrapping process.

    • unwrap

      public static <T> T unwrap(org.json.JSONObject jsonObject, com.landawn.abacus.type.Type<? extends T> targetType) throws org.json.JSONException
      Unwraps the provided JSONObject into an instance of the specified target type.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the object to return.
      Parameters:
      jsonObject - The JSONObject to be unwrapped into an instance of the target type.
      targetType - The type of the object to return. This is used to determine how to unwrap the JSONObject.
      Returns:
      An instance of the specified target type that represents the provided JSONObject.
      Throws:
      org.json.JSONException - if there is an error during the unwrapping process.

    • unwrap

      public static <T> List<T> unwrap(org.json.JSONArray jsonArray) throws org.json.JSONException
      Unwraps the provided JSONArray into a List.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the objects in the list.
      Parameters:
      jsonArray - The JSONArray to be unwrapped into a List.
      Returns:
      A new List that represents the provided JSONArray.
      Throws:
      org.json.JSONException - if there is an error during the unwrapping process.

    • toList

      public static <T> List<T> toList(org.json.JSONArray jsonArray, Class<? extends T> elementClass) throws org.json.JSONException
      Converts the provided JSONArray into a List of the specified element type.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the elements in the list.
      Parameters:
      jsonArray - The JSONArray to be converted into a List.
      elementClass - The class of the elements in the list.
      Returns:
      A new List that represents the provided JSONArray.
      Throws:
      org.json.JSONException - if there is an error during the conversion process.

    • toList

      public static <T> List<T> toList(org.json.JSONArray jsonArray, com.landawn.abacus.type.Type<T> elementType) throws org.json.JSONException
      Converts the provided JSONArray into a List of the specified element type.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the elements in the list.
      Parameters:
      jsonArray - The JSONArray to be converted into a List.
      elementType - The type of the elements in the list. This is used to determine how to convert the JSONArray.
      Returns:
      A new List that represents the provided JSONArray.
      Throws:
      org.json.JSONException - if there is an error during the conversion process.
